amendatorysection.catchline: School land within defense project; purchase by United States.
amendatorysection.para: The United States of America may purchase any educational lands located within the boundaries of any defense project.

annotation.para: Legislature provided for a public offering, preceded by public notice, of all educational lands subject to lease. State v. Platte Valley P. P. & I. Dist., 147 Neb. 289, 23 N.W.2d 300 (1946).
